attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0878133911. The Ford Ranger is still one of the best bakkies in the market. The engine on these Rangers is effortless in its power execution and driving style. The ride quality is exceptional and improves when towing. Towing is so easy and fuel economy is great under load or just cruising. Comfortable cabin space as well as the option to off road easily makes the Ford Ranger a great choice for any style of terrain.

Images are for illustration purposes only
